reviews.review_msg: Best lecturer I've ever had after years of university.  Bright, enthusiastic, and exceptionally articulate, she's the kind of prof whose course you'd take, whatever the content.

Lealle Ruhl in my entire academic career has been by far the greatest professor I have had. She is intelligent, humorous, quick-witted, and everything you would want in a professor to make you feel engaged in a lecture. Highly recommended for any person who appreciates great debates and discourse in a lecture.

This professor is awesome! She is extremely helpful and really wants her students to be successful. I had an awesome experience with her. I took a political science 210 course with her and she really knew her stuff. I learned a great deal. She has a young & cool way of teaching. I'd take her again if I could!

i'm a man. she is the best teacher i have ever had by a long shot. i'm not sure why other men on this site have dissed her. she will challenge you like youve never been challeneged before. im really shocked at her assesment here. she's amazing.

I took this class in the summer of 2003. There were 3 other guys in the class. It was the most horrible experience I have ever had ast SFU. She is totally cocky, too opinionated, pushy, close minded etc...She is was makes guys think feminists are a bunch of battle axes.

Dr.Ruhl is an awesome teacher. As a male I never found that she was unfair towards men or anything. And I participated, without always agreeing with her, regularly. She's funny, quick, smart and intresting. I defenetly recommend her. Her tests and assignments are somewhat hard but, but fair, & she will help clarify any problems on assignments.
Gave me castration anxiety!
No Comments
Excellent prof! Great lectures and very motivating! Gives excellent feedback on essays and appreciates original thought and effort!
Excellent prof. She's very animated and keeps material which has the potential to be very dull, and keeps it lively and engaging. Top marks!

I took a course with her in the summer of 2003 and I still have nightmares about her. If you have an abundance of testosterone functioning in you system, and even if you think you are a feminist, beware the impotent causing potential of Lealle Ruhl!!!
No Comments
One of the worst teachers I had in U. Locked inside the prism of her own ideas. Battlefield mentally in political discourse.  Close minded, obtus...proliferates ignorance.

Amazing energy, clarity and direction. For a male in a feminist class - her ease, humour and candor made class very interested - attended 90% of the time - because I really enjoyed the way she taught *highly recommended*
amazing energy and enthusiasm, even for boring topics.  excellent prof, should be given tenure!
Best prof I've ever had!  Funny, witty, hot, briliant!!
Best prof I have ever had, and I've been to 3 different universities! Intelligent, funny, clever, and an absolute pleasure to have lecture!
Intelligent, witty, a joy to listen to. Wish that all profs were this great!
oh my god. brilliant. amazing.
Great teacher.
Far too energetic - she makes me anxious
really enthusiastic, enjoyable lecture
Made impossible topics as totally clear is less than an hour!
Excellent class and helped open up my thinking.  She is really funny.
What crap!
